channel.title: Latest Posts on Tech Index
channel.description: Recent content in Latest Posts on Tech Index

item.title: Why 2025 Is The Year Of Agentic AI
item.description: Agentic AI is moving from passive chat interfaces to systems that take initiative, execute tasks autonomously, and get real work done. In 2025, these agents are finally maturing into practical tools that save time and boost productivity.

item.title: 10 Essential Notion Templates For Project Management In 2025
item.description: Discover the top 10 Notion templates that can transform how you handle projects in 2025, from simple task trackers to full-blown team dashboards. I break down what makes each one stand out and why they fit real workflows today.
